name: Atrium Prestige Thalasso Spa Resort & Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent a week here with my wife and we are really feeling the pain of coming home!
reviews.title: Can we move in?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We don't really go in for resort/beach holidays so this was a novelty for us, but we just needed a break. Our normal holiday is spent camping (Scotland, Europe and the US), touring (Europe and the US) or hiking (mostly around Yorkshire!).
reviews.title: Overall a great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is amazing. The rooms, are spacious, the views incredible, the pools are well served and the beach is not crowded (and had some decent snorkelling!)
reviews.title: The perfect, luxury escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are what really made it stand apart - always helpful, never in your face and knowledgeable about the area, food and wines they served.
reviews.title: Superb hotel in Rhodes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We are already planning on returning later in the year, but we will avoid peak season - I am not sure how this resort would cope if it was completely full!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very little to fault with this excellent hotel. Previous positive reviews are very accurate. We cannot fault the hotel's design, staff, food, pools or beach. Points you might want to be of aware of:
reviews.title: Two weeks of luxury and sun after a miserable English spring

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: Ideal wedding in ideal place, Rhodes Atrium Prestige Thalasso Spa and Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: - Sandy beach and plenty of sunloungers on the beach and around the pools.
reviews.title: Great holiday and lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: - Our package with Inspired Luxury Escapes included a complimentary massage and a day's use of the spa facilities. Both were excellent. There is a small gym with 4 machines.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, fantastic staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Good variety of food - a la carte and buffet. We were on half board (breakfast and evening meal) and that was plenty for us.
reviews.title: A Great Hotel for R&R

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were a little sceptic about a 5* greek hotel. The deal was amazing and we hadnt been to Greece for nearly ten years, although we used to go often when our children were small and it was so very cheap and welcoming then for families. Well...It surpassed all our expectations..staff so genuine and friendly,wanting to please. I dont think one member of staff from manager to cleaner and gardener, passed us without saying hello and smiling. And it never felt fake!
reviews.title: WONDERFUL SURPRISE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant manager was spot on ! He was exceptional infact..and always had time to make you feel special and welcome, whilst making sure his staff were doing a brilliant job. Christos, our usual waiter, always had a wide smile, a warm welcome, and deserves credit for making everyone feel special..he is a treasure! Make sure you keep him!!
reviews.title: Fantastic Week

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In a hotel this size, it always felt like it was just for us. The smaller pool, with breathtaking views and peace, in early season was just too good to be true......and the food!!!! WOW! We cant express how highly we rated it....we will be back next spring...doubted other reviews because we have stayed in some amazing 5 * Hotels around the world...but its Greek 5*..and it needs to be proud.!
reviews.title: Wonderful spa treatments and great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Overall a fantastic week the accommodation staff and general situation was as good as anticipated. Having spent a week last year at the Atrium Palace which we also enjoyed the only negatives for us were the transfer time of approximately 2 hours and the completely isolated location,if we were to return we would hire a car from the airport giving us the opportunity of accessing the local attractions and shops.We wish to add that the staff at this hotel were first class we would like to thank all the staff and give a special mention to Nikos the Maitre De and Irine his able assistant who ran the main restaurant in a friendly and professional manner.We would definetly recommend this hotel for the fantastic views and relaxed atmosphere.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I picked this hotel for a relaxing holiday with lots of spa treatments. Athina, the spa manager, runs a wonderful and highly trained team of therapists. As one myself, I really appreciated how good the treatments were so my thanks to May, Konstantina and Zaharias and the girls on reception, I spent a lot of time in the spa! You rate as one of the best spas I have visited.
reviews.title: THANK YOU MY FRIENDS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife (always the goddess in finding the best hotels at the best prices) managed to find and book a one week stay at this resort. It was it's first week of opening this season...
reviews.title: Beautiful setting and hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: So on our arrival to Rhodes, we rented a little car from Olympus car rentals (took just under half a tank to get to the hotel and back).. But on our arrival, the drive and the main entrance was superb. We were both impressed with the size of this place and the glass front.
reviews.title: How many ways to describe Stunning ???????

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Getting into the hotel the staff were friendly and welcoming (although I feel bad for saying this as I speak only 2 word of Greek) the staff behind the desk were sometimes a little hard to understand but managed very well and we were soon being shown to our room.
reviews.title: A truly 5 star hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: It was clear when we left the reception area there was much more to this place that the frontage. It sprawls down the side of the cliff area, with impressive rooms that over look the sea and many many swimming pools and stairs all the way down to the beach bar (and of course beach).
reviews.title: Amazing, Excellent, 5* Experience.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The complex was stunning, we spend a lazy week around the 'Chapel' pool as we had grass under foot and our room was spacious clean and had good air conditioning. Everything can be charged to your room including the shopping in the few shops on the complex.
reviews.title: great management

aka: Atrium Prestige Thalasso Spa Resort And Villas
description: Stunning architecture and divine horizon blue views complement the Atrium Prestige.Captivating scenery, fabulous accommodation and a stunning Thalasso Spa offer an experience created exclusively for those who know there is no such thing as too much luxury. Ambiance and remarkable decor match the unique experience of your stay. Endless time of relaxation in the most refined of atmospheres. Inspired low rise accommodation with a choice of deluxe rooms, suites, bungalows and villas. Privacy & serenity steps from the seashore.
